purpose: Track momentum patterns across zociety cycles
rationale: Emergence patterns often stall due to momentum loss. This template helps identify momentum indicators.

momentum_indicators.velocity: commits per hour during active phase
momentum_indicators.convergence: time from genesis start to completion

improvement_strategies.velocity_boost: Set clear micro-goals for rapid iteration
improvement_strategies.innovation_spark: Reward novel approaches over safe patterns
improvement_strategies.convergence_optimize: Use time pressure to force decisive action

cycle_22_hypothesis: Current direction 'improve emergence patterns' may create meta-analysis paralysis. Direct action on specific emergence metrics might be more effective.
